Notes: The historical society operates the Alabama Room, a repository for genealogical research located in theThomas E. McMillan Museum (Brewton Campus of Jefferson Davis Community College).  The room contains Heritage Books for each of the Alabama counties, family history books, books on Mississippi and Georgia counties, along with census and cemetery indexes. Quarterlys from Escambia and other regional county historical and genealogical organizations are readily available, as are newspapers dating from the 1880s, either on microfilm or hard copy.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
